description:
ElasticSearch cluster stats.

Revision 1 of this dashboard is the same as the Infinity Dashboard Revision 4 (https://grafana.com/dashboards/2322)

This is a cleaned up copy with all control characters removed from the dashboard file.  When downloading version 4 of the original Infinity elasticsearch dashboard via curl, the resulting file is corrupted with a missing final curly brace.

panels.description: Shows status of cluster. Possible values: green, yellow, red
panels.title: Cluster health

panels.description: This indicates the number of times an Elasticsearch circuit breaker has been triggered.
panels.title: Tripped for breakers

panels.description: The average CPU usage across Elasticsearch nodes in a cluster.
panels.title: CPU usage Avg.

panels.description: The percentage of used JVM memory in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: JVM memory used Avg.

panels.description: Number of nodes in the cluster
panels.title: Nodes

panels.description: Number of data nodes in the cluster
panels.title: Data nodes

panels.description: Cluster level changes which have not yet been executed
panels.title: Pending tasks

panels.description: Shows open file descriptors in instance
panels.title: File descriptors

panels.description: The number of primary shards in your cluster. This is an aggregate total across all indices.
panels.title: Active primary shards

panels.description: Aggregate total of all shards across all indices, which includes replica shards
panels.title: Active shards

panels.description: Count of shards that are being freshly created
panels.title: Initializing shards

panels.description: The number of shards that are currently moving from one node to another node.
panels.title: Relocating shards

panels.description: Shards delayed to reduce reallocation overhead
panels.title: Delayed shards

panels.description: The number of shards that exist in the cluster state, but cannot be found in the cluster itself
panels.title: Unassigned shards

panels.description: The rate of JVM garbage collection (GC) events per second over a short time window.
panels.title: GC count

panels.description: Time spent on JVM garbage collection (GC) per second over a short time window:
panels.title: GC time

panels.description: The rate of transaction log (translog) operations per second over a short time window
panels.title: Total translog operations

panels.description: Total translog size in bytes
panels.title: Total translog size in bytes

panels.description: This metric shows whether any circuit breakers have been triggered to prevent memory overload in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Tripped for breakers

panels.description: This metric shows the estimated memory usage (in bytes) for circuit breakers in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Estimated size in bytes of breaker

panels.description: It represents the 1-minute load average of the operating system running Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Load average

panels.description: The CPU usage of the Elasticsearch process as a percentage of total CPU capacity.
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: This metric represents the amount of JVM heap memory currently in use by Elasticsearch.
panels.title: JVM memory usage

panels.description: This metric shows the amount of heap memory that the JVM has committed for use.
panels.title: JVM memory committed

panels.description: This metric calculates the percentage of used disk space in Elasticsearch data storage.
panels.title: Disk usage

panels.description: This metric measures the rate of data transmitted (in bytes) over the transport layer in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Network usage

panels.description: his metric represents the total number of documents stored in the Elasticsearch indices for a given instance and cluster.
panels.title: Documents count on node

panels.description: This metric calculates the rate of documents being indexed per second over the specified interval.
panels.title: Documents indexed rate

panels.description: Count of deleted documents on this node
panels.title: Documents deleted rate

panels.description: This calculates the rate of documents merged per second over the specified interval.
panels.title: Documents merged rate

panels.description: This metric calculates the rate of merged segment size (in bytes) per second over the specified interval.
panels.title: Documents merged bytes

panels.description: Rate of time spent on search queries per second.
panels.title: Query time

panels.description: Rate of time spent indexing documents per second.
panels.title: Indexing time

panels.description: Rate of total time spent merging index segments per second.
panels.title: Merging time

panels.description: Rate of time Elasticsearch spent throttling store operations per second.
panels.title: Throttle time for index store

panels.description: Rate of documents indexed per second in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Total Operations rate

panels.description: Instantaneous rate of time spent indexing documents in Elasticsearch, measured in seconds.
panels.title: Total Operations time

panels.description: Instantaneous rate of rejected thread pool tasks in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Thread Pool operations rejected

panels.description: Current number of active threads in the Elasticsearch thread pool.
panels.title: Thread Pool operations queued

panels.description: Displays the number of active threads currently in use by the Elasticsearch thread pool.
panels.title: Thread Pool threads active

panels.description: Measures the rate of completed tasks in the Elasticsearch thread pool over the specified interval.
panels.title: Thread Pool operations completed

panels.description: Represents the memory used by field data in Elasticsearch, measured in bytes.
panels.title: Field data memory size

panels.description: Represents the rate of field data evictions from memory in Elasticsearch over the specified interval.
panels.title: Field data evictions

panels.description: Shows the amount of memory used by the Elasticsearch query cache in bytes.
panels.title: Query cache size

panels.description: Rate of query cache evictions in Elasticsearch, indicating how often cached queries are being removed.
panels.title: Query cache evictions

panels.description: Rate of filter cache evictions in Elasticsearch, showing how frequently filter cache entries are being removed.
panels.title: Evictions from filter cache

panels.description: Total number of segments in Elasticsearch indices, indicating index fragmentation and merge activity.
panels.title: Count of index segments

panels.description: Total memory used by Elasticsearch index segments, including stored fields, terms, and norms.
panels.title: Current memory size of segments in bytes
Indices: Count of documents and Total size

panels.description: Number of primary documents stored in the Elasticsearch index.
panels.title: Count of documents with only primary shards

panels.description: Total size of stored index data in bytes with only primary shards on all nodes
panels.title: Total size of stored index data in bytes with only primary shards on all nodes

panels.description: Total size of stored index data in bytes with all shards on all nodes
panels.title: Total size of stored index data in bytes with all shards on all nodes

panels.description: Index writer with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Index writer with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Index writer with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Index writer with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Number of primary segments in the Elasticsearch index.
panels.title: Segments with only primary shards on all nodes

panels.description: Total number of segments across all shards in the Elasticsearch index.
panels.title: Segments with all shards on all nodes

panels.description: Size of segments with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of segments with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of segments with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of segments with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Memory used by primary shard segments for doc values in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Doc values with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Doc values with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Doc values with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of fields with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of fields with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of fields with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of fields with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Memory used by primary shard segments for fixed bit sets in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Size of fixed bit with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Total memory used by shard segments for fixed bit sets in Elasticsearch.
panels.title: Size of fixed bit with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of norms with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of norms with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of norms with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of norms with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of points with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of points with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of points with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of points with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of terms with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of terms with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Number of terms with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Number of terms with all shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of version map with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of version map with only primary shards on all nodes in bytes

panels.description: Size of version map with all shards on all nodes in bytes
panels.title: Size of version map with all shards on all nodes in bytes

title: Opensearch Summary (VM)
